languages.text: Враг развернул корабли широкой косой, намереваясь охватить эскадру, но плану еретиков не суждено было сбыться — Торбальд и Оптикон-22 бросили свои соединения вперед, связав противника боем и предоставив Лорд-капитану возможность нанести удар в самое сердце вражеских позиций — туда, где ожидали своего часа флагманские суда изменников Человечества.

The enemy deployed their ships in a wide arc in an attempt to surround the squadron, but the heretics' plan was not meant to be — Thorbald and Opticon-22 sent their detachments forward, tying up the enemy in combat and presenting the Lord Captain with the chance to deliver a blow to the very heart of the enemy position, where the flagships of these traitors to Humanity awaited their final hour.
languages.original_text: Враг развернул корабли широкой косой, намереваясь охватить эскадру, но плану еретиков не суждено было сбыться — Торбальд и Оптикон-22 бросили свои соединения вперед, связав противника боем и предоставив Лорд-капитану возможность нанести удар в самое сердце вражеских позиций — туда, где ожидали своего часа флагманские суда изменников Человечества.

traits.locale_text: The enemy deployed their ships in a wide arc in an attempt to surround the squadron, but the heretics' plan was not meant to be — Thorbald and Opticon-22 sent their detachments forward, tying up the enemy in combat and presenting the Lord Captain with the chance to deliver a blow to the very heart of the enemy positions, where the flagships of the traitors to Humanity awaited their hour.

The enemy deployed their ships in a wide arc in an attempt to surround the squadron, but the heretics' plan was not meant to be — Thorbald and Opticon-22 sent their detachments forward, tying up the enemy in combat and presenting the Lord Captain with the chance to deliver a blow to the very heart of the enemy positions, where the flagships of the traitors to Humanity awaited their hour.

The enemy deployed their ships in a wide arc in an attempt to surround the squadron, but the heretics' plan was not meant to be — Thorbald and Opticon-22 sent their detachments forward, tying up the enemy in combat and presenting the Lord Captain with the chance to deliver a blow to the very heart of the enemy position, where the flagships of these traitors to Humanity awaited their final hour.

The enemy deployed their ships in a wide arc in an attempt to surround the squadron, but the heretics' plan was not meant to be — Thorbald and Opticon-22 sent their detachments forward, tying up the enemy in combat and presenting the Lord Captain with the chance to deliver a blow to the very heart of the enemy position, where the flagships of these traitors to Humanity awaited their final hour.

The enemy deployed their ships in a wide arc in an attempt to surround the squadron, but the heretics' plan was not meant to be — Thorbald and Opticon-22 sent their detachments forward, tying up the enemy in combat and presenting the Lord Captain with the chance to deliver a blow to the very heart of the enemy position, where the flagships of these traitors to Humanity awaited their final hour.

languages.text: 敌人将舰船排成巨大的弧形，试图包围这支中队，但他们的计划破产了。索巴德和奥普蒂孔22号派遣了分队向前进攻，缠住敌人，为领主舰长争取到了合适的时机，对敌人的阵地核心发起致命一击，人类叛徒的旗舰在宏炮的烈焰中迎来了终结。
languages.original_text: The enemy deployed their ships in a wide arc in an attempt to surround the squadron, but the heretics' plan was not meant to be — Thorbald and Opticon-22 sent their detachments forward, tying up the enemy in combat and presenting the Lord Captain with the chance to deliver a blow to the very heart of the enemy position, where the flagships of these traitors to Humanity awaited their final hour.

traits.locale_text: 敌人将舰船排成巨大的弧形，试图包围这支中队，但他们的计划破产了。索巴德和奥普蒂孔22号派遣了分队向前进攻，缠住敌人，为领主舰长争取到了合适的时机，对敌人的阵地核心发起致命一击，人类叛徒的旗舰在巨炮的烈焰中迎来了终结。

languages.text: 敵は艦隊を包囲しようと、大きく弧を描くように船を展開させたが、異端者の計画は意図した通りには行かなかった。トールバルドとオプティコン-22は分遣艦を前進させ、敵を戦闘不能に追い込み、人類への裏切り者の旗艦が最後の時を待つ敵陣の心臓部に一撃を加えるチャンスを、ロード・キャプテンに与えたのだ。
languages.original_text: The enemy deployed their ships in a wide arc in an attempt to surround the squadron, but the heretics' plan was not meant to be — Thorbald and Opticon-22 sent their detachments forward, tying up the enemy in combat and presenting the Lord Captain with the chance to deliver a blow to the very heart of the enemy position, where the flagships of these traitors to Humanity awaited their final hour.

traits.locale_text: 敵は艦隊を包囲しようと、大きく弧を描くように船を展開させたが、異端者の計画は意図した通りには行かなかった。トールバルドとオプティコン-22は分遣艦を前進させ、敵を戦闘不能に追い込み、人類への裏切り者の旗艦が最後の時を待つ敵陣の心臓部に一撃を加えるチャンスを、ロード・キャプテンに与えたのだ。

languages.text: El enemigo desplegó sus naves en un amplio arco en un intento de rodear a la escuadra, pero el plan de los herejes no estaba destinado a funcionar: Thorbald y Opticon-22 enviaron sus destacamentos hacia delante, atando al enemigo en combate y presentando {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán la oportunidad de asestar un golpe en el mismo corazón de la posición enemiga, donde las naves insignia de estos traidores de la Humanidad esperaban su hora final.
languages.original_text: The enemy deployed their ships in a wide arc in an attempt to surround the squadron, but the heretics' plan was not meant to be — Thorbald and Opticon-22 sent their detachments forward, tying up the enemy in combat and presenting the Lord Captain with the chance to deliver a blow to the very heart of the enemy position, where the flagships of these traitors to Humanity awaited their final hour.

traits.locale_text: El enemigo desplegó sus naves en un amplio arco en un intento de rodear a la escuadra, pero el plan de los herejes no estaba destinado a funcionar: Thorbald y Opticon-22 enviaron sus destacamentos hacia delante, atando al enemigo en combate y presentando {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán la oportunidad de asestar un golpe en el mismo corazón de la posición enemiga, donde las naves insignia de estos traidores de la Humanidad esperaban su hora final.

languages.text: Der Feinde ordnete seine Schiffe in einem weiten Bogen an, um das Geschwader zu umzingeln, doch der Plan der Ketzer ging nicht auf. Thorbald und Opticon-22 schickten ihre Einheiten vor, banden den Feind im Kampf und gaben dem Lord Captain so die Gelegenheit, einen Stoß mitten ins Herz der feindlichen Formation auszuführen, wo die Flaggschiffe dieser Verräter an der Menschheit ihr letztes Stündlein erwarteten.
languages.original_text: The enemy deployed their ships in a wide arc in an attempt to surround the squadron, but the heretics' plan was not meant to be — Thorbald and Opticon-22 sent their detachments forward, tying up the enemy in combat and presenting the Lord Captain with the chance to deliver a blow to the very heart of the enemy position, where the flagships of these traitors to Humanity awaited their final hour.

traits.locale_text: Der Feinde ordnete seine Schiffe in einem weiten Bogen an, um das Geschwader zu umzingeln, doch der Plan der Ketzer ging nicht auf. Thorbald und Opticon-22 schickten ihre Einheiten vor, banden den Feind im Kampf und gaben dem Lord Captain so die Gelegenheit, einen Stoß mitten ins Herz der feindlichen Formation auszuführen, wo die Flaggschiffe dieser Verräter an der Menschheit ihr letztes Stündlein erwarteten.

languages.text: L'ennemi déploie ses bâtiments en un grand arc pour tenter de cerner l'escadron, mais le plan des hérétiques est voué à l'échec : Thorbald et l'unité Opticon-22 envoient leurs détachements en première ligne, prenant l'adversaire en tenaille et offrant {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} une fenêtre de tir pour anéantir le cœur de la formation ennemie, où les vaisseaux amiraux de ces traîtres à l'humanité attendent leur dernière heure.
languages.original_text: The enemy deployed their ships in a wide arc in an attempt to surround the squadron, but the heretics' plan was not meant to be — Thorbald and Opticon-22 sent their detachments forward, tying up the enemy in combat and presenting the Lord Captain with the chance to deliver a blow to the very heart of the enemy position, where the flagships of these traitors to Humanity awaited their final hour.

traits.locale_text: L'ennemi déploie ses bâtiments en un grand arc pour tenter de cerner l'escadron, mais le plan des hérétiques est voué à l'échec : Thorbald et l'unité Opticon-22 envoient leurs détachements en première ligne, prenant l'adversaire en tenaille et offrant {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} une fenêtre de tir pour anéantir le cœur de la formation ennemie, où les vaisseaux amiraux de ces traîtres à l'humanité attendent leur dernière heure.
